subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd had the 10th triple-double of his playoff career, as the Nets took a 2-1 lead in their N.B.A. first-round playoff series.
snippet: Jason Kidd had the 10th triple-double of his playoff career, as the Nets took a 2-1 lead in their N.B.A. first-round playoff series.
